external_games.name: Chatan Yarakuu Shanku: The Karate Tournament
Chatan Yarakuu Shanku: The Karate Tournament

name: Chatan Yarakuu Shanku: The Karate Tournament
summary: A karate fighting game from Mitchell Corp. From the creator of Strider, it was a more realistic attempt at a fighting game, departing significantly from the street Fighter formula used by most fighters.
